# PR #2: Create a sites showcase landing page

**Status**: `MERGED` âœ… | **Branch**: `copilot/create-sites-showcase-page` â†’ `main`

**Changes**: +146 -0 across 1 files

## Description

## Overview
This PR addresses the user story: "As a user, when I visit the wclaytor.github.io/sites folder, I want a showcase landing page that lets me see what sites are available to check out."

## Changes Made
Created a new landing page at `/sites/index.html` that serves as a showcase for all available web projects and experiments in the repository.

## Features
The showcase page includes:

- **Hero Section**: Eye-catching header with "Sites Showcase" title and tagline
- **Project Cards**: Three featured projects, each with:
  - Descriptive title and overview
  - Gradient background matching each site's visual theme
  - "Visit Site" button for easy navigation
- **Consistent Design**: Maintains the same Bootstrap/Grayscale theme used across the main site
- **Navigation**: Working links to return to the home page and navigate between sections
- **Contact Section**: Consistent footer with email and social media links

## Projects Showcased
1. **Alpine Waves** - Interactive wave generator built with Alpine.js and Tailwind CSS
2. **Ambient Beat Nexus** - Immersive algorithmic art and ambient texture generator with Three.js visualizations
3. **Alpine Algorithmic Art** - Creative coding platform using Alpine.js and p5.js

## Screenshot
![Sites Showcase Page](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8fd0cc11-e7b2-4930-85a2-df77b3e16d24)

The page provides an intuitive way for visitors to discover and explore the various creative web projects available in the repository.
